title: Glasgow
name: Riverside Museum
content: A recently reopened museum with an excellent collection of vehicles and models to tell the story of transport by land and sea, with a unique Glasgow flavour. Besides the usual rail locomotives, buses, trams, cars and planes, the museum also includes a recreated subway station and a street scene of old Glasgow. <!--This museum is also listed on the [[Urban Rail]] page, please update there with any major changes. -->
